Key Match Events: Lautaro Martínez scored in the 47th and 86th minutes, scoring for a third straight match.
Leandro Paredes missed a penalty in the 72nd minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Lautaro Martínez expressed happiness for scoring in the three group-stage games and helping the team.
He mentioned feeling prepared for the Copa America after a great season at Inter Milan.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina dominated possession in the first half and had three attempts on target.
Peru's goalkeeper Pedro Gallese made several saves, including a notable one from a well-struck free kick by Leandro Paredes.
Argentina will face the Group B runner-up in the quarterfinals on Thursday in Houston.
